Plots given IFS object

Plots IFS object with given depth and color

plot(.Object, depth, color)

Arguments

.Object

IFS object
depth

depth to which we want to call functions
color

optional color for fractal, default color is black

Examples

func_list <- list(f1,f2)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'f1' not found
fractal <- createIFS(func_list)
#> Error in createIFS(func_list): object 'func_list' not found
plot(fractal, 6, 'red')
#> Error in plot(fractal, 6, "red"): object 'fractal' not found
